verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marvellous|strong="G2298"\w*, \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* is filled \w up|strong="G5055"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* a \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w glass|strong="G5193"\w* \w mingled|strong="G3396"\w* with \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* had gotten the \w victory|strong="G3528"\w* \w over|strong="G1537"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mark|strong="G5480"\w*, \add and\add* \w over|strong="G1537"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w glass|strong="G5193"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w harps|strong="G2788"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w sing|strong="G0103"\w* the \w song|strong="G5603"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* the \w servant|strong="G3588"\w* of \w God|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* the \w song|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G3004"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3173"\w*, \w Great|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2298"\w* \w marvellous|strong="G3588"\w* \add are\add* \w thy|strong="G2962"\w* \w works|strong="G4675"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G1342"\w*; \w just|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G0228"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w* \add are\add* \w thy|strong="G3588"\w* \w ways|strong="G4675"\w*, thou \w King|strong="G3588"\w* of \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w shall|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*? \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \add thou\add* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \add art\add* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* shall \w come|strong="G2240"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w judgments|strong="G1345"\w* are made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* I \w looked|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* was \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*, clothed \w in|strong="G1746"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w white|strong="G2986"\w* \w linen|strong="G3043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* having \w their|strong="G4012"\w* \w breasts|strong="G4738"\w* \w girded|strong="G4024"\w* with \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w girdles|strong="G2223"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* unto the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w vials|strong="G5357"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* was \w filled|strong="G1072"\w* with \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* was \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w till|strong="G0891"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w* of the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* were \w fulfilled|strong="G5055"\w*.
